message:
It's always great to see an agency approach human trafficking from this direction.
 
"LMPD Sgt. Tim Stokes said the department's investigation had two focuses – to find and charge individuals who hoped to commit sexual acts with minors, and to give those women in the industry resources and an opportunity to escape.
"Those demonstrate the resolve to hold human traffickers accountable and also the compassion for those caught up in the industry," Stokes said Monday."

attachments.media_description: In Kentucky Derby sex trafficking case, police tout emphasis on recovery for women

media_desc: In Kentucky Derby sex trafficking case, police tout emphasis on recovery for women
